Branch_Submit_Review.title: Submit Branch for Review
sqlexec: update {schema}.branch set branch_sts='REVIEW',branch_review_sts='PENDING' where branch_id=@branch_id and (({schema}.my_user_is_publisher() = 1) or (branch_id in (select branch_id from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where branch_type='USER' and branch_sts='ACTIVE' and branch_access='RW')));
update {schema}.v_my_current_branch set new_branch_id = null where branch_id = @branch_id;
